requirements.summary: Redesign the overall visual theme of the application with a fresh, cohesive aesthetic — including a new color palette, typography choices, and layout structure — that feels distinct from the current dark mode implementation
acceptanceCriteria: A new color palette is defined in index.css and tailwind.config.js, replacing the current OKLCH tokens
The new theme is applied consistently across HomeFeed, ListingDetail, Profile, Search, Chat, and all shared components
The AppHeader, BottomNav, HeroSection, and ListingCard components all reflect the new visual style
Typography (font choices, sizes, weights) is updated to match the new theme
Both light and dark mode variants are updated to reflect the new palette
The overall layout and spacing feels clean and organized on both mobile and desktop viewports

file_operations.description: Replace the current OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens with a new fresh color palette. Define new --background, --foreground, --card, --primary, --secondary, --accent, --muted, --border, and semantic color tokens for both light and dark themes. Update typography by importing new Google Fonts (if needed) and defining font-family custom properties. Ensure the new palette feels vibrant, modern, and distinct from the current dark implementation while maintaining accessibility contrast ratios.

Update the Tailwind theme configuration to reference the new CSS custom properties defined in index.css. Modify the colors object to map to the new --background, --foreground, --card, --primary, --secondary, --accent, --muted, and --border tokens. Update border radius values if needed for a softer or sharper aesthetic. Adjust shadow definitions to complement the new color palette. Ensure the extend object properly wires the new theme tokens into Tailwind utility classes.

Apply the new visual theme to the AppHeader component. Update background colors, text colors, and border styles to use the new theme tokens. Adjust padding, height, and spacing to match the new layout structure. Update button styles (theme toggle, search, profile actions) to reflect the new aesthetic. Ensure the logo and branding elements align with the fresh cohesive design. Verify responsive behavior on mobile and desktop viewports.

Redesign the BottomNav component with the new theme. Update background colors, icon colors, and active/inactive tab states using the new palette tokens. Adjust the unread message badge styling to match the new accent colors. Update spacing, padding, and icon sizes for improved visual hierarchy. Ensure the navigation bar feels cohesive with the overall app aesthetic and maintains touch-friendly tap targets on mobile.

Redesign the HeroSection with the new visual theme. Update the background overlay colors and opacity to complement the new palette. Adjust text colors, font weights, and sizes for the tagline and stats using the new typography tokens. Update the stats row styling (border, background, spacing) to match the new card aesthetic. Ensure the hero image at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1400x500.png integrates well with the new color overlay. Verify layout and spacing on both mobile and desktop.

Apply the new theme to the ListingCard component. Update card background, border, and shadow styles using the new theme tokens. Adjust text colors for title, price, and location to match the new palette. Update the condition badge and sponsored indicator styling with new accent colors. Adjust spacing, padding, and border radius to align with the new layout structure. Ensure hover and active states reflect the new aesthetic. Verify the card displays correctly in grid layouts on various viewport sizes.

Update the HomeFeed page to reflect the new visual theme. Ensure all section backgrounds, text colors, and spacing use the new theme tokens. Update loading skeleton styles to match the new palette. Adjust the featured listings row and category filter bar to align with the new aesthetic. Update empty state styling if applicable. Ensure the overall page layout feels clean and organized with consistent spacing and hierarchy on both mobile and desktop viewports.

Apply the new theme to the ListingDetail page. Update background colors, card styles, and text colors throughout the page. Adjust the photo carousel, seller info section, and review sections to use the new theme tokens. Update button styles for report/share actions and the review form to match the new aesthetic. Ensure all interactive elements (buttons, inputs) reflect the new color palette and typography. Verify layout and spacing consistency on mobile and desktop.

Redesign the Profile page with the new theme. Update the profile header background, text colors, and button styles. Adjust the stats row styling to use the new accent colors and card aesthetic. Update the tabbed listings/reviews view to match the new palette. Ensure inline-editable fields use the new input styling. Update the logout button to reflect the new button aesthetic. Verify the page layout feels cohesive and clean on both mobile and desktop.

Apply the new visual theme to the Search page. Update the search input styling, recent search chips, and popular category buttons to use the new theme tokens. Adjust the results grid and zero-results state to match the new aesthetic. Update all text colors, backgrounds, and interactive element styles. Ensure the page layout maintains clean spacing and hierarchy with the new palette on mobile and desktop.

Redesign the Chat page with the new theme. Update conversation list item backgrounds, borders, and text colors. Adjust the blurred preview state for unauthenticated users to use the new palette. Update the login prompt styling to match the new aesthetic. Ensure spacing and layout consistency across the page. Verify the new theme applies to all conversation items and empty states on both mobile and desktop.

Update the SearchBar component to match the new visual theme. Adjust input background, border, text colors, and placeholder styling using the new theme tokens. Update the search icon and clear button colors. Ensure focus states and hover effects align with the new aesthetic. Verify the component integrates well with pages that use it (Search, AppHeader).

Apply the new theme to the SellerInfo component. Update avatar background, text colors, verified badge styling, and location/rating text to use the new palette. Adjust spacing and typography to match the new layout structure. Ensure the loading skeleton state reflects the new theme colors.

Redesign the CategoryFilter component with the new theme. Update the category pill backgrounds, borders, text colors, and active/selected states using the new theme tokens. Adjust emoji rendering and listing count badge styling. Ensure the horizontal scroll behavior and spacing align with the new aesthetic on mobile and desktop.

Update the FeaturedListingsRow component to use the new visual theme. Adjust card backgrounds, borders, shadows, and text colors for the featured listing cards. Ensure the horizontal scroll behavior and spacing match the new layout structure. Verify the component displays correctly on both mobile and desktop.

Apply the new theme to the PhotoCarousel component. Update navigation button backgrounds, icon colors, and dot indicator styling to use the new palette. Adjust the fullscreen overlay background and controls to match the new aesthetic. Ensure the carousel integrates well with the ListingDetail page layout.

Redesign the ReviewsList component with the new theme. Update review item backgrounds, borders, text colors, and star rating colors. Adjust the loading skeleton and empty state styling to match the new palette. Ensure spacing and typography align with the new layout structure.

Apply the new visual theme to the ConversationItem component. Update background, border, text colors, and thumbnail styling to use the new theme tokens. Adjust spacing and typography for the other user's name, message preview, and timestamp. Ensure hover and active states reflect the new aesthetic.

Redesign the MessageBubble component with the new theme. Update sent/received bubble backgrounds, text colors, and border styles using the new palette. Adjust timestamp styling and edit/delete action button colors. Ensure the deleted-message placeholder state matches the new aesthetic. Verify the bubbles display correctly in the MessageThread layout.

Apply the new theme to the MyListingCard component. Update card background, border, shadow, and text colors. Adjust the status badge, price, and location text styling to use the new palette. Update action button colors (edit, delete, boost) to match the new aesthetic. Ensure the delete confirmation dialog reflects the new theme.

Redesign the ProfileStatsRow component with the new visual theme. Update stat card backgrounds, borders, text colors, and icon colors using the new theme tokens. Adjust spacing and typography for the animated count-up stats. Ensure the grid layout displays correctly on mobile and desktop.

Apply the new theme to the LoginPrompt component. Update background colors, text colors, button styles, and card backgrounds for both the modal and full-page variants. Adjust spacing and typography to match the new aesthetic. Ensure the Internet Identity login button reflects the new palette.

Redesign the ProfileSetup form with the new theme. Update input field backgrounds, borders, text colors, and placeholder styling. Adjust button colors and hover states to match the new aesthetic. Update the form container background and spacing to align with the new layout structure.

Apply the new visual theme to the EditProfileForm component. Update input styling, button colors, and form layout to use the new theme tokens. Ensure toast notifications (success/error) reflect the new palette. Adjust spacing and typography to match the new aesthetic.

Redesign the InlineEditField component with the new theme. Update read-only display and editable input styling to use the new theme tokens. Adjust save/cancel button colors and icon colors. Ensure focus states and hover effects align with the new aesthetic.

Apply the new theme to the StarRating component. Update star colors for filled/empty states using the new accent/muted tokens. Adjust hover states for interactive mode. Ensure the component displays correctly in all three sizes and integrates well with review components.

Update the SkeletonListingCard component to reflect the new theme. Adjust skeleton background colors, animation, and layout to match the new ListingCard styling. Ensure the skeleton provides a smooth loading experience with the new palette.

Apply the new visual theme to the ZeroResultsState component. Update background, text colors, and suggested category button styling to use the new theme tokens. Adjust spacing and typography to match the new aesthetic. Ensure the empty state feels cohesive with the Search page.

Redesign the InstallBanner component with the new theme. Update banner background, text colors, button styling, and dismiss button colors using the new palette. Ensure the banner integrates well with the bottom navigation on mobile and displays correctly on iOS.

Apply the new theme to the CreateListing page. Update form input backgrounds, borders, text colors, and button styles. Adjust the photo upload component styling to match the new aesthetic. Update dropdown, radio, and number input styling. Ensure the overall form layout feels clean and organized with the new palette on mobile and desktop.

Redesign the EditListing page with the new visual theme. Update all form input styling, button colors, and layout to use the new theme tokens. Ensure the pre-populated fields display correctly with the new input aesthetic. Adjust spacing and typography to match the CreateListing form for consistency.

Apply the new theme to the MessageThread page. Update the chat container background, input field styling, and send button colors. Ensure the guest name prompt dialog reflects the new aesthetic. Adjust message bubble spacing and overall layout to match the new palette. Verify auto-scroll and responsive behavior.

Redesign the PublicProfile page with the new visual theme. Update avatar, location, rating, and reviews section styling to use the new theme tokens. Adjust the active listings grid to match the new ListingCard aesthetic. Ensure the read-only layout feels cohesive with the authenticated Profile page.

Apply the new theme to the ReviewForm component. Update input field, textarea, and button styling to use the new palette. Adjust the star rating integration to match the new aesthetic. Ensure the form displays correctly on the ListingDetail page with proper spacing.

Redesign the PhotoUpload component with the new visual theme. Update preview thumbnail backgrounds, borders, and remove button styling. Adjust the upload button and drag-drop zone colors to match the new palette. Ensure the component integrates well with the CreateListing and EditListing forms.

Apply the new theme to the BoostModal dialog. Update modal background, border, shadow, and text colors. Adjust boost option card styling and button colors to use the new theme tokens. Ensure the dialog displays correctly over the listing detail or profile pages.

Redesign the ReportModal with the new visual theme. Update dialog background, text colors, radio button styling, and submit button colors. Ensure the modal integrates well with the ListingDetail page and reflects the new palette.

Apply the new theme to the GuestNamePrompt dialog. Update modal background, input field styling, and button colors (submit, login alternative) to use the new theme tokens. Adjust spacing and typography to match the new aesthetic.

Redesign the ProfileTabs component with the new visual theme. Update tab button backgrounds, text colors, active/inactive states, and underline indicators using the new palette. Adjust the listings, reviews, activity, and following content sections to match the new aesthetic. Ensure tab switching feels smooth and cohesive.

Apply the new theme to the RecentSearchChips component. Update chip backgrounds, borders, text colors, and dismiss button styling. Adjust the 'clear all' button to match the new palette. Ensure the chips integrate well with the Search page layout.
